Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.shadowroot

Class ShadowDomUtils

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.shadowroot.ShadowDomUtils
public class ShadowDomUtils extends Object
Utility class for interacting with Shadow DOM elements using Selenium. Provides methods to locate elements within Shadow Roots, including support for waiting and polling mechanisms.
Author:
Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª

  • Method Details

    • findElementInShadowRoots

      public static SmartWebElement findElementInShadowRoots(SmartWebDriver driver, org.openqa.selenium.By by)
      Finds the first matching element across the entire document, including nested shadow roots. Waits up to the default timeout duration, polling at defined intervals.
      Parameters:
      driver - The SmartWebDriver instance.
      by - The By locator to use.
      Returns:
      The found SmartWebElement, or null if not found.

    • findElementInShadowRoots

      public static SmartWebElement findElementInShadowRoots(SmartWebDriver driver, org.openqa.selenium.By by, long waitInMillis)
      Finds the first matching element across the document and nested shadow roots with a specified timeout.
      Parameters:
      driver - The SmartWebDriver instance.
      by - The By locator.
      waitInMillis - Maximum wait time in milliseconds.
      Returns:
      The found SmartWebElement, or null if not found.

    • findElementInShadowRoots

      public static SmartWebElement findElementInShadowRoots(SmartWebElement root, org.openqa.selenium.By by)
      Finds the first matching element in nested Shadow DOMs, starting from a given root element. Waits up to the configured maximum wait time, polling every DEFAULT_POLL_INTERVAL_MS.
      Parameters:
      root - The root SmartWebElement to start the search from.
      by - The By locator to use for finding the element.
      Returns:
      The found SmartWebElement, or null if no element is found within the time limit.

    • findElementsInShadowRoots

      public static List<SmartWebElement> findElementsInShadowRoots(SmartWebDriver driver, org.openqa.selenium.By by)
      Finds all matching elements across the document and nested shadow roots. Waits up to the configured maximum wait time, polling every DEFAULT_POLL_INTERVAL_MS.
      Parameters:
      driver - The SmartWebDriver instance.
      by - The By locator to use for finding the elements.
      Returns:
      A list of SmartWebElement containing all matching elements, or an empty list if no elements are found.

    • findElementsInShadowRoots

      public static List<SmartWebElement> findElementsInShadowRoots(SmartWebElement root, org.openqa.selenium.By by)
      Finds all matching elements within a given Shadow DOM root. Waits up to the configured maximum wait time, polling every DEFAULT_POLL_INTERVAL_MS.
      Parameters:
      root - The root SmartWebElement to start the search from.
      by - The By locator to use for finding the elements.
      Returns:
      A list of SmartWebElement containing all matching elements, or an empty list if no elements are found.

    • shadowRootElementsPresent

      public static boolean shadowRootElementsPresent(SmartWebDriver driver)
      Checks whether there are elements with Shadow DOM in the current document.
      Parameters:
      driver - The SmartWebDriver instance.
      Returns:
      True if Shadow DOM elements are present, otherwise false.

    • shadowRootElementsPresent

      public static boolean shadowRootElementsPresent(SmartWebElement root)
      Checks if there is at least one element that has a Shadow Root starting from a given WebElement.
      Parameters:
      root - The root SmartWebElement to check.
      Returns:
      True if the root element or any descendant has a Shadow Root, otherwise false.
